allTitles: {"en":"About Coronavirus","luy":"Kamakhuwa ke bulwale bwa Korona","swh":"Virusi vya Ugonjwa wa Korona"}

4.eng: There's only ONE thing you need to understand about how a coronavirus
4.luy: Okhoya omanye sindu silala khu bulwale bwa Korona
4.swh: Kuna jambo MOJA tu unalopaswa kuelewa juu ya jinsi virusi vya Korona

12.eng: The virus spreads when these droplets
12.luy: Bulwale buno bukenda khubirira luasimulo lwo
12.swh: Virusi hivi vinasambaa wakati vitone hivi vya mate

13.eng: Keep your distance.﻿ ﻿2m will keep you safe ﻿from large droplets.
13.luy: Ima asinao. Noli chimita chibili khukhwama khumundu oli ne bulwale liasimulo se lilakhwolakho ta
13.swh: Kwenda mbali. Ukiwa umbali wa mita 2 hutafikiwa na vitone vikubwa vya mate.

17.eng: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:
17.luy: Ne obona omundu okholola, namwe oasimula mala alwala okhoyela
17.swh: Kwa hivyo, unapoona mtu akikohoa/kwenda chafya/mgonjwa unaweza kuamua:

18.eng: Give them a mask.﻿ ﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby
18.luy: Baelesia emaski nyo nebaasimula bandu babandi bakhanyola bulwale buno ta
18.swh: Wape barakoa. Waweze kukoholea au kuendea chafya na kuwakinga wote walio karibu

22.eng: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
22.luy: Bandu banyala barumikhila emaski/sitambaa mumoni nyo belinde balekhe khunyola bulwale
22.swh: Pengine yeye si mgonjwa, anajikinga tu

23.eng: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are stillinfectious
23.luy: Bandu bali ne bulwale buno banyala bafwana oli bakhali balwale ta, mala khabaambisia bandu babandi
23.swh: Watu wenye virusi huenda wasionyeshe ishara zozote, lakini bado wanaweza kuvisambaza

24.eng: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
24.luy: Okhacha mubandu bakali ta, sikila somanya nanu omulwale ta
24.swh: Kwa jumla, ni wazo bora kuepuka umati wa watu, maana huwezi kujua kama kuna mtu mgonjwa.

28.luy: Niye bandu batila nyo elifti enine namwe yiikhe

32.eng: & even on the outside of your face mask
32.luy: Ata enje we chimaski/bitambaa bye khwiboa mumoni
32.swh: & hata nje ya barakoa ya usoni mwako

38.eng: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…
38.luy: Mumasee kakandi, kamare ko omulwale kanyala katila bindu bikali nga
38.swh: Isitoshe, huenda mate ya mtu mgonjwa yakawa kwenye vitu vingine …

42.eng: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,
42.luy: Notilile bibindu bino nokhamanyile ta, mala witile mumoni namwe
42.swh: Ukigusa mojawapo wa vitu hivi kwa bahati mbaya, kisha ujiguse uso,

43.eng: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
43.luy: Engila enyala birusi bino ebechanga khubisinga nende esabuni namwe nende jik namwe kamalwa
43.swh: na njia ya kipekee iliyo bora kuviondoa ni kuviosha kwa sabuni, dawa ya klorini, au kileo.

44.eng: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects
44.luy: Birusi binyala byekhala mubindu muda kumuleyi sana
44.swh: Virusi vinaweza kukaa saa kadhaa juu ya vifaa,

47.eng: Which is why it is also good to follow these
47.luy: Sikila eli bulayi khulonda bindu bino nio wilinde
47.swh: Kwa sababu hii ni vizuri pia kuyafuata maelekezo haya

48.luy: Singa nende esabuni paka wole mukhumbo

51.eng: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
51.luy: Okhatila mumoni mwowo namwe mwo mundu okundi ta. Nokhoyela otile, singa kamakhono nende esabuni bulayi.
51.swh: Usijiguse uso. (Au uuguse uso wa mtu mwingine yeyote.) Iwapo ni lazima ujiguse, kwanza ioshe mikono yako kabisa kwa sabuni.

52.eng: Enough time to sing ﻿"Happy Birthday" twice
52.luy: Ne wenya omanye oli wasingile kamakhono bulayi onyala wemba lulwimbo lwa mwanawamberi chisafari chitaru
52.swh: Muda sawa na wa kuimba kifungu cha “Wimbo wa Taifa” ﻿https://youtu.be/a37RnI3krzU

56.eng: wash the back of your hands

58.eng: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
58.luy: Notilile okharenga ta, singa busa kamakhono kowo.
58.swh: Iwapo umefanya hivyo, usihofu. Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni hapo baadaye.

59.eng: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.
59.luy: Okhatila enje we emaski/sitambaa sye mumoni tawe
59.swh: Pia, usiguse upande wa nje wa barakoa iwapo utaweza.

61.eng: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long
61.luy: Buchafu bunyala bwakhurerera bulwale norumikhila bitambaa bye mumoni khu siise siileyi
61.swh: *Vijidudu vinavyosababisha magonjwa hukulia ndani ya barakoa unapozivaa kwa muda mrefu

62.eng: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!
62.luy: Mwata chimaski/bitambaa bye mumoni. Okhafwara wabira endalo endala ta
62.swh: Zitupe barakoa zinapoanza kuwa nzito. Usizivae kwa zaidi ya siku moja!

67.swh: Kila mtu awe na taulo yake

68.eng: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.
68.luy: Mukharumikhila byakhulia, chisaani, bikombe namwe chitaulo chindala tawe
68.swh: Usitumie kwa pamoja vitu kama chakula,vyombo vya jikoni,vikombe,taulo.

69.eng: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
69.luy: Se onyala wa tila mumoni nende ekhukunyu ta, wakhakhaka
69.swh: Huwezi kuugusa uso wako kwa kisugudi hata ukijaribu

70.eng: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
70.luy: No onyala, fungula namwe ikala kimilyango nende chikhumbo namwe kamabeka
70.swh: Fungua na funga milango kwa kutumia kisugudi au bega badala ya mikono, inapowezekana.

72.eng: and after being out in the public

74.eng: Always wash your hands with soap…
74.swh: Kila wakati nawa mikono yako ukitumia sabuni …

80.eng: Read the articles for more tips!
80.luy: Newenya khumanya kamakali chilila khusoma niko baandike angaki ano

81.eng: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
81.luy: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
81.swh: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, ﻿in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

82.eng: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
82.luy: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
82.swh: "The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. ﻿(Jan 25, 2020)

83.eng: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
83.luy: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
83.swh: "How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)

84.luy: Niyo khuamisye kamakhua kano ke muosibitali
84.swh: Marejeo zaidi ya habari za kiafya:

85.eng:
Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: ﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. ﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project ﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com
85.luy:
Kamakhuwa kali musitaabu sino kosi kayeta khukhwilinda khukhwama khu bulwalwe bubundi  nono kakhoyele karumikhe mulimenya lia buli endaalo.
Kamakhuwa kali musitaabu sino kali khulondekhana nende kamanyikhane khu bulwale bwa Conrona mpaka tarehe 28 februari 2020 ne kama mu kakaandikwa mukalandokho.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Sitaabu sia Comic mulusungu sinyala sianyolekha khuinterneti khu ﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sitaabu sino sesili siekhukusia tawe. Onyala wakaba babandu mubikuli,muchingo, siakazi khurumukhila interneti namwe WhatsApp.
Nokaba ekasi yino kumbuka:
Okhabadilisia sisindu siosi musitaabu sino tawe 
Sitaabu sino sikhakusibwa tawe.
Nokaba khuinterneti, tambua omumyikinyi khu facebook @weimankowart, @weimankowart khu instagram
Khu burumisi bubundi, reba erusa khucomicsforgood@gmail.com
85.swh:
Hoja za ziada: Maelekezo haya ya kiafya ya vibonzo yanafaa sana katika kuzuia maambukizi ya kawaida kama mafua na homa, na yanafaa kuzingatiwa daima, hata wakati hakuna mkurupuko wa magonjwa.
Marejeo: Habari iliyo katika kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo imejikita kwa uelewa wa ugonjwa wa COVID19 kufikia tarehe 28 Februari 2020, na imetolewa kwa marejeo hii tatu. ﻿https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Habari za ziada: Unaweza kupata toleo la PDF la kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kutoka kwa tovuti hii: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Maelekezo ya Kutumia: Kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kiko huru kwa matumizi ya umma kupitia kwa tovuti na mitandao ya kijamiii kama vile Whatsapp na Telegram. Vile vile, nakala zinazotolewa kutoka kwa tovuti zinaweza kuchapishwa bure kama vibango vya matumizi ya kibinafsi na kielimu nyumbani, shuleni, na mahali pa kazi.  
Wakati unapowapa wengine kijitabu hiki, tafadhali kumbuka hoja hizi 3: ﻿1) Hakuna ruhusa kuhariri chochote kwa njia yoyote unapokisambaza. ﻿2) Vibonzo hivi haviwezi kutumiwa kwa mradi wowote wa kuleta faida. ﻿3) lwapo unakisambaza kupitia kwa tovuti, weka jina la mwandalizi wa kitabu katika FB kwa kuweka @weimankowart, kwa IG kwa kuweka @weimankow (IG), au hata kuandika linki kwa instagram com/weimankow Kwa matumizi mengineyo yote, tafadhali tuma ombi kwa: comicsforgood@gmail.com

90.luy: Created by Weiman Kow, instagram: weimankow

bookText.eng:
About Coronavirus



There's only ONE thing you need to understand about how a coronavirus
SPREADS
Mouth
Nose
Eyes
Get into your

Healthy Person
Sick person
The virus spreads when these droplets

Keep your distance.﻿ ﻿2m will keep you safe ﻿from large droplets.
1
2m
Achoo!
So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

Give them a mask.﻿ ﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby
2
Thank you ﻿*sniffles*
OR,
Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself
People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are stillinfectious
And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.
Chopsticks

Healthy person


Train straps

Lift buttons


Tissues

Cups
Digital devices
& even on the outside of your face mask
Stair bannisters


Mouse

Pens
Door knobs
Their hands

However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

you might all fall sick
or your loved one’s face

rub eyes

And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.
Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects

Soap
precautions
Which is why it is also good to follow these
wash with ﻿soap up to here
soap
elbow
Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.
Enough time to sing ﻿"Happy Birthday" twice

under the nails

for 20 seconds


between the fingers


wash the back of your hands

What is thoroughly?

If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.
Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

droplets
*Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

Use a serving spoon

Baby
Daddy
Mommy
Everyone gets their own towel

Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried
Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.

Home

and after being out in the public


Before you eat
Always wash your hands with soap…

And finally,
Soap
Stay safe, everyone!

Stay safe, everyone!
Soap
Read the articles for more tips!
"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. (Jan 25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
Main references for medical info:

Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic. 
References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references.
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: ﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces. 
When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. ﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project ﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com
About Coronavirus
bookText.luy:
Kamakhuwa ke bulwale bwa Korona



Okhoya omanye sindu silala khu bulwale bwa Korona
NGA BUKENDA

Mukhanwa
Muliolu
Moni
Ne lwingila mu
Mwo omundu okhali omulwale ta
Omundu omulwale

Bulwale buno bukenda khubirira luasimulo lwo
Ima asinao. Noli chimita chibili khukhwama khumundu oli ne bulwale liasimulo se lilakhwolakho ta

1
2m
Achoo!
Ne obona omundu okholola, namwe oasimula mala alwala okhoyela 

Baelesia emaski nyo nebaasimula bandu babandi bakhanyola bulwale buno ta

2
Wiboe ﻿mumoni

Namwe
Bandu banyala barumikhila emaski/sitambaa mumoni nyo belinde balekhe khunyola bulwale
Bandu bali ne bulwale buno banyala bafwana oli bakhali balwale ta, mala khabaambisia bandu babandi

Okhacha mubandu bakali ta, sikila somanya nanu omulwale ta

Bisala biekhusikila chinyama

Omundu okhali omulwale ta

Kimishipi kya matatu namwe emiksi
Niye bandu batila nyo elifti enine namwe yiikhe
Chikaratasi che khupangusia kamakhono
Bikombe

Chisimu namwe chitableti

Ata enje we chimaski/bitambaa bye khwiboa mumoni
Niyo witilila nyo onine mugorofa
Notila sikendesio sia ekomputa
Chikalamu
Kimilyango
Kamakhono kabwe

Mumasee kakandi, kamare ko omulwale kanyala katila bindu bikali nga

Onyala wa lwala

Namwe mumoni mwo omusime wowo

Wasugue chimoni
Notilile bibindu bino nokhamanyile ta, mala witile mumoni namwe

Engila enyala birusi bino ebechanga khubisinga nende esabuni namwe nende jik namwe kamalwa

Birusi binyala byekhala mubindu muda kumuleyi sana

Esabuni

Khukhwilinda
Sikila eli bulayi khulonda bindu bino nio wilinde

Singa nende esabuni paka wole mukhumbo
Esabuni

Mukhumbo

Okhatila mumoni mwowo namwe mwo mundu okundi ta. Nokhoyela otile, singa kamakhono nende esabuni bulayi.

Ne wenya omanye oli wasingile kamakhono bulayi onyala wemba lulwimbo lwa mwanawamberi chisafari chitaru

Mukari mwe kamatere
khu chisekundi ishirini

akarikari we chinjala
Singa enyuma we kamakhono
Onyala wasinga kamakhono bulayi oriena?

Notilile okharenga ta, singa busa kamakhono kowo.

Okhatila enje we emaski/sitambaa sye mumoni tawe

Luluasimulo

Buchafu bunyala bwakhurerera bulwale norumikhila bitambaa bye mumoni khu siise siileyi

Mwata chimaski/bitambaa bye mumoni. Okhafwara wabira endalo endala ta

Rumikhila sichiko sie khubhukulila byakhulia

Omwana
Papa
Maayi
Bulimundu arumikhile etaulo yewe
Mukharumikhila byakhulia, chisaani, bikombe namwe chitaulo chindala tawe

Se onyala wa tila mumoni nende ekhukunyu ta, wakhakhaka

No onyala, fungula namwe ikala kimilyango nende chikhumbo namwe kamabeka

Nochile engo
Newamile enje

Nio olie

Singa kamakhono nende esabuni

Ne malila

Esabuni
Murame bulayi bulimundu

Murame bulayi bulimundu

Esabuni
Newenya khumanya kamakali chilila khusoma niko baandike angaki ano

bookText.swh:
Virusi vya Ugonjwa wa Korona



Kuna jambo MOJA tu unalopaswa kuelewa juu ya jinsi virusi vya Korona
VINAVYOSAMBAA
Mdomoni
Puani
Machoni
Vinapokuingia
Mtu mwenye Afya
Mgonjwa wa Korona
Virusi hivi vinasambaa wakati vitone hivi vya mate
Kwenda mbali. Ukiwa umbali wa mita 2 hutafikiwa na vitone vikubwa vya mate.     
1
Mita 2
Achoo!
Kwa hivyo, unapoona mtu akikohoa/kwenda chafya/mgonjwa unaweza kuamua:

Wape barakoa. Waweze kukoholea au kuendea chafya na kuwakinga wote walio karibu
2
Vitone vya *kamasi*
AU,
Pengine yeye si mgonjwa, anajikinga tu
Watu wenye virusi huenda wasionyeshe ishara zozote, lakini bado wanaweza kuvisambaza
Kwa jumla, ni wazo bora kuepuka umati wa watu, maana huwezi kujua kama kuna mtu mgonjwa.
Vijiti vya kulia

Mtu mwenye afya
Vishikilio vya gari
Vitufe vya lifti

Tishu

Vikombe

Vifaa vya kidijitali

& hata nje ya barakoa ya usoni mwako

Kingo za ngazi
Kipanya

Kalamu
Vitasa vya mlango

Mikononi mwao

Isitoshe, huenda mate ya mtu mgonjwa yakawa kwenye vitu vingine … 
nyote mnaweza kuugua. 

au umguse mwenzako uso  

ujisugue macho

Ukigusa mojawapo wa vitu hivi kwa bahati mbaya, kisha ujiguse uso, 
na njia ya kipekee iliyo bora kuviondoa ni kuviosha kwa sabuni, dawa ya klorini, au kileo.  
Virusi vinaweza kukaa saa kadhaa juu ya vifaa,
Sabuni

Kwa sababu hii ni vizuri pia kuyafuata maelekezo haya
Oga kwa ﻿sabuni hadi hapa

Sabuni

Kisugudi
Usijiguse uso. (Au uuguse uso wa mtu mwingine yeyote.) Iwapo ni lazima ujiguse, kwanza ioshe mikono yako kabisa kwa sabuni.
Muda sawa na wa kuimba kifungu cha “Wimbo wa Taifa” ﻿https://youtu.be/a37RnI3krzU

chini ya kucha


kwa ﻿sekunde 20

katikati mwa vidole

nawa nyuma ya mikono yako

Nini maana ya kuoga kabisa?
Iwapo umefanya hivyo, usihofu. Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni hapo baadaye.
Pia, usiguse upande wa nje wa barakoa iwapo utaweza. 
vitone vya mate
*Vijidudu vinavyosababisha magonjwa hukulia ndani ya barakoa unapozivaa kwa muda mrefu
Zitupe barakoa zinapoanza kuwa nzito. Usizivae kwa zaidi ya siku moja! 
Tumia kijiko cha kupakulia

Mtoto
Baba
Mama
Kila mtu awe na taulo yake

Usitumie kwa pamoja vitu kama chakula,vyombo vya jikoni,vikombe,taulo.
Huwezi kuugusa uso wako kwa kisugudi hata ukijaribu
Fungua na funga milango kwa kutumia kisugudi au bega badala ya mikono, inapowezekana.
Nyumbani
na unaporudi kutoka kwa umma

Kabla hujala

Kila wakati nawa mikono yako ukitumia sabuni …
Hatimaye,

Sabuni
Kaeni salama, 
Nyote!

Kaeni salama, 
Nyote!

Sabuni
Soma makala hii ujue zaidi!

"This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, ﻿in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
"The Wuhan Virus: How to stay safe", by Laurie Garrett, in Foreign Policy, Report. ﻿(Jan 25, 2020)
"How to avoid the coronavirus? Wash your hands", by Elizabeth Rosenthal, in the New York Times, Opinion. (Jan 28, 2020)
Marejeo zaidi ya habari za kiafya:

Hoja za ziada: Maelekezo haya ya kiafya ya vibonzo yanafaa sana katika kuzuia maambukizi ya kawaida kama mafua na homa, na yanafaa kuzingatiwa daima, hata wakati hakuna mkurupuko wa magonjwa.
Marejeo: Habari iliyo katika kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo imejikita kwa uelewa wa ugonjwa wa COVID19 kufikia tarehe 28 Februari 2020, na imetolewa kwa marejeo hii tatu. ﻿https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10
Habari za ziada: Unaweza kupata toleo la PDF la kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kutoka kwa tovuti hii: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart 
Maelekezo ya Kutumia: Kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kiko huru kwa matumizi ya umma kupitia kwa tovuti na mitandao ya kijamiii kama vile Whatsapp na Telegram. Vile vile, nakala zinazotolewa kutoka kwa tovuti zinaweza kuchapishwa bure kama vibango vya matumizi ya kibinafsi na kielimu nyumbani, shuleni, na mahali pa kazi.  
Wakati unapowapa wengine kijitabu hiki, tafadhali kumbuka hoja hizi 3: ﻿1) Hakuna ruhusa kuhariri chochote kwa njia yoyote unapokisambaza. ﻿2) Vibonzo hivi haviwezi kutumiwa kwa mradi wowote wa kuleta faida. ﻿3) lwapo unakisambaza kupitia kwa tovuti, weka jina la mwandalizi wa kitabu katika FB kwa kuweka @weimankowart, kwa IG kwa kuweka @weimankow (IG), au hata kuandika linki kwa instagram com/weimankow Kwa matumizi mengineyo yote, tafadhali tuma ombi kwa: comicsforgood@gmail.com
Virusi vya Ugonjwa wa Korona

title: Kamakhuwa ke bulwale bwa Korona
